title: How do I Filter the Practice Audit Trail?
body:
Follow these steps to Filter the Practice Audit Trail:
Navigate to the Practice Audit Trail (click More -> Audit) and Select System Audit

Click System Audit
                                                      The practice audit trail has now been filtered.
*NOTE: Only users with the security role of "Practice Owner" will be able to view the audit trail for the whole practice and all users. Other users will only have access to their own audit trail.
